name: slack-mailreminder
description: slack command to send quick note email to someone

USERNAME.description: Optional: Username to use when replying with the conversion result (default: jpalala)

EMOJI.description: Optional: Emoji icon to use when replying with the conversion result (default: :email:)

SLACK_TOKEN.description: Optional: Additional security step: Slack slash command token for verification that the request came from your Slack team
